page.title: 09DAWSON FAMILY SON/FATHER
page.content: At 7.45am.Andrew got up ,got dressed and let the dogs out.He had breakfast. At 9.00am.Andrew went to school to help with the Hockey Tournament.He left at 11.30am.Andrew had lunch. At 12.45pm Dad took Andrew to the Scout Gala.Andrew had a stall.At 5.30pm he went home,had dinner,watched television,had a bath and went to bed at 9.15pm. At 10.00am.Dad got up,dressed and had breakfast.He mended a window sash.At 12.00am.he had lunch.At 12.45pm he took Andrew to Newark.He spent the afternoon at the Scout Gala.At 5.30pm he took the family home.Dad had tea,had a bath,watched television and went to bed at 11.15pm.
